item.title: Nintendo announces Black Friday and Cyber Monday 2025 deals
item.content:encoded:
• Switch
  • Switch 2

Select games available for $39.99 and $29.99.

Nintendo has announced its Black Friday and Cyber Monday 2025 deals, which include savings on The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom and Donkey Kong Country Returns HD, select amiibo, Samsung MicroSD Express Cards, and more.

Get the details below.

  • Begin your Nintendo Switch 2 adventures and experience the next evolution of Nintendo Switch with the Nintendo Switch 2 system (suggested retail price of $449.99) or the Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart World Bundle (suggested retail price of $499.99).
  • With Nintendo Switch 2, players can enjoy exclusive titles such as Donkey Kong Bananza, purchase upgrade packs for select Nintendo Switch games like The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, experience recent releases like Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition and pre-order upcoming titles like Kirby Air Riders and Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition. Plus, you can enjoy compatible physical and digital Nintendo Switch games.
  • Visit My Nintendo Store and Nintendo eShop on Nintendo Switch 2 or Nintendo Switch November 20 through December 3 at 11:59 p.m. PT for the Cyber Deals sale, featuring holiday offers on select games.
  • Beginning November 23, select retailers—including both official Nintendo U.S. stores—will offer deals on physical versions of Nintendo Switch games: Princess Peach: Showtime!, The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, Donkey Kong Country Returns HD, Luigi’s Mansion 3, and Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe (suggested retail price of $39.99 each); as well as Super Mario Odyssey, Nintendo Switch Sports, Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, and Splatoon 3 (suggested retail price of $29.99 each).
  • The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, Super Mario Odyssey, and Splatoon 3 all have free Nintendo Switch 2 updates so you can enjoy smoother gameplay at higher resolutions when playing them on Nintendo Switch 2.
  • Select amiibo, including The Legend of Zelda Series Sages amiibo figures of Tulin, Yunobo, Riju and Sidon; Street Fighter 6 amiibo figures of Jamie, Kimberly and Luke; and the Street Fighter 6 – amiibo Card Starter Set will all be $10 off MSRP at select retailers.
  • Finally, starting November 30 at Nintendo San Francisco, Nintendo New York, and select retailers, you can keep the holiday cheer going with $20 off MSRP on Samsung MicroSD Express Cards and get additional storage space for more games on Nintendo Switch 2.

Get ready to get jolly and try out some of the latest Nintendo Switch 2 games from Nintendo with events at select retailers this season. These in-store events are free, and attendees will have an opportunity to receive Nintendo themed giveaways while supplies last.

  • On November 15 and December 13, participating Best Buy locations will host demos of Mario Kart World, Donkey Kong Bananza, and more.
  • On December 6, local GameStop locations will host demos of Mario Kart World, Donkey Kong Bananza, Kirby Air Riders, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, and more.
  • Plus, hop aboard the GameTruck + Walmart Holiday Tour to play Mario Kart World with GameTruck at select Walmart locations on weekends starting November 15 to December 13 from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. local time. For a list of participating stores and event dates, visit the official Walmart site.

item.title: Ereban: Shadow Legacy coming to PS5, Xbox Series in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Stealth action platformer currently available for PC.

Publisher Selecta Play and developer Baby Robot Games will release stealth action platformer Ereban: Shadow Legacy for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series in 2026, the companies announced.

Ereban: Shadow Legacy first launched for PC via Steam on April 10, 2024.

In addition to the digital release, Selecta Play will also release physical standard and Collector’s editions of Ereban: Shadow Legacy for PlayStation 5 in North America and Europe. The Collector’s Edition will include the original soundtrack, a key chain of Ayana’s mask, three art postcards, two iron-on patches (Helios and Forgotten Sun), and a collector’s box.

Here is an overview of the game, via Baby Robot Games:

About

Ereban: Shadow Legacy is a fast-paced stealth platformer game where you become Ayana, the last descendant of a forgotten race. Harness mystical shadow powers, high-tech gadgets and avoid or kill to uncover the truth about your past and the key to saving a dying, morally grey universe. What will your legacy be?

Become One with the Shadows

Experience an unprecedented combination of stealth and shadows with the Shadow Merge ability. Dive into shadows and move freely through them to climb walls, reach inaccessible places, attack from cover or advance unseen.

Absorb echoes to learn more lethal and non-lethal shadow powers, craft high-tech gadgets, and combine all this with your agility to infiltrate Helios lines and investigate what they are hiding.

Define Your Shadow Legacy… And Live with the Consequences

Avoid or kill. Spare or consume. The decision is yours: how far are you willing to go to uncover the truth?

Approach each level with your own style of play. Use your powers to move like a ghost or strike as a deadly shadow in this sci-fi universe where actions go beyond good and evil.

Explore a Dying, Beautiful World in Your Search of the Truth

As the last descendant of the Ereban, unravel the mystery of who you are and what happened to your people. Traverse the ruins of lifeless cities, infiltrate sci-fi facilities carved into ancient temples and discover the remnants of your forgotten race.

Uncover the truth about Helios, the cryptic energy megacorporation that claims to have solved the energy crisis.
